page.title: 05LEISURE TIME SURVEY
page.content: A survey was conducted to see how people spend their leisure time in this area, and these are the results:- 70 percent of people like to go out and 30 percent of people prefer to stay indoors when using their leisure time. Of the people who go out, 42 percent go swimming, 21 percent visit Sport Centres, 17 percent visit local parks, 10 percent visit friends's houses, 5 percent go to youth clubs, and 5 percent use the local running track. Of the people who like to stay at home, nearly all were found to have a hobby that occupied their leiseure time. 14 percent collected stamps, 21 percent played chess, 14 percent played on computers, 8 percent watched television, 7 percent read books, 14 percent collected keyrings, 7 percent
